title: A moral methode of ciuile policie contayninge a learned and fruictful discourse of the institution, state and gouernment of a common weale. Abridged oute of the co[m]mentaries of the reuerende and famous clerke, Franciscus Patricius, Byshop of Caieta in Italye. Done out of Latine into Englishe, by Rycharde Robinson, citizen of London. Seene and allowed. [et]c. Anno Domini 1576.
author: Patrizi, Francesco, 1413-1494.
publisher: Anno Domini. 1576. Imprinted at London in Fleetestreate neare to S. Dunstans Churche by Thomas Marsh. Cum priuilegio,
notes: A translation of: De institutione reipublicae.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
